e1.title: AI and Society Symposium
e1.description: A day-long symposium discussing the impact of artificial intelligence on various aspects of society. Features keynote speakers from the tech industry and academia.

e2.title: Cybersecurity Hackathon
e2.description: A 48-hour hackathon where students compete to develop innovative cybersecurity solutions. Open to all majors, with prizes for the best ideas.

e3.title: Women in Tech Conference
e3.description: A conference celebrating and promoting diversity in tech, with panels, workshops, and networking opportunities for women in STEM fields.

e4.title: Virtual Reality Expo
e4.description: An exhibition showcasing the latest advancements in virtual reality technology, including student projects and industry demonstrations.

e5.title: Data Science Workshop
e5.description: A hands-on workshop teaching practical data science skills, including data analysis and visualization techniques.

e6.title: Future of Gaming Panel Discussion
e6.description: A panel discussion featuring game developers and scholars, exploring the future trends and ethical considerations in gaming.

e7.title: IoT Innovations Fair
e7.description: A fair where students present their innovative Internet of Things projects, with opportunities for industry collaboration and feedback.

e8.title: Alumni Tech Talks
e8.description: A series of talks by distinguished alumni sharing their experiences and insights in the tech industry.
